name: Wacky Races (1991)
description:
For the later video of the same name, see Wacky Races (2000 video game).
Wacky Races (チキチキマシン猛レース-, Chiki Chiki Machine Mou Race) is a platform video game for the NES. The game is based on the Hanna-Barbera cartoon Wacky Races and features Muttley and Dick Dastardly as the main characters.
An unrelated Amiga and Atari ST game of the same name was released in 1991 and a racing game of the same name came out in 2000.
